Uses of DatabaseException in com.imaginea.mongodb.common.exceptions
 

Subclasses of DatabaseException in com.imaginea.mongodb.common.exceptions
 class DeleteDatabaseException
          Defines Exception generated while performing delete operation on a Database.
 class DuplicateDatabaseException
          Defines Exception generated when a User tries to insert a Duplicate Database which is not permitted.
 class InsertDatabaseException
          Defines Exception generated while performing insert operation on a Database.
 class UndefinedDatabaseException
          Defines Exception generated when a user tries to access a database that does not exist.
